mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lounge (lounge_id, lounge_pet_type, user_id, lounge_title, lounge_content, lounge_writer, lounge_date,lounge_img, lounge_replyCount) VALUES ( null, #{lounge_pet_type}, #{user_id}, #{lounge_title}, #{lounge_content}, (SELECT nickname FROM member WHERE user_id = #{user_id}), now(), #{lounge_img}, #{lounge_replyCount} )
mapper.update: UPDATE lounge SET lounge_pet_type = #{lounge_pet_type}, lounge_title = #{lounge_title}, lounge_content = #{lounge_content}, lounge_img = #{lounge_img}, lounge_date = now() WHERE lounge_id = #{lounge_id}
